name: DoorToDoor_PreAlpha
description:
Flashlight : Hold Left Click

Door: Hold right click

Run  through: W

Turn around: S

Hear breathing:  hold door shut

See close monster: close door quickly (if black) / or flicker flash (if white)

See far monster: wait / check until its gone

See small monsters: hold flash

YOU ARE BEING CHASED: look into the darkness to calm down the chaser, you will see his door open more as he gets less impatient, move to the next door before he gets you
